Message.Title: question for amzn traders
Message.Msg: does it always trade so technically perfectly between short term support and resistance? One week, no losing trades, a couple four baggers and typical 50-100% gains daily trading it with a short bias now but also long calls when we hit support. Am I just lucky or is it really so well behaved its this easy?

Message.Msg: i am a mid sized seller and know if it were not for the brand I would jump and would if a better mousetrap with a comparable non ebay brand emerged. Topic.Title: NASDAQ goes haywire...trading halted

Message.Msg: Some possible reasons: 1. Big sell orders were coming, so MMs asked Nasdaq to halt trading until they can get institutional investors to help them counter selling. They've been making frantic phone calls. 2. Some big boys shorts wanted to cover, but retail buyers were bothering them today, so they asked Nasdaq to halt trading to cover while retail buyers and shorts were out of the picture.
